edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment

Class TaxiUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment.TaxiUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TaxiUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener
    TaxiUI creates and populates a JFrame with 3 JTextFields for GasInput, Input, and Output, a combo box and button to provide functionality of recording trips and adding gas, reporting gas, distance.

    Variables:
    currCab - RentedTaxi object that is currently selected in the UI
    cabList - ArrayList of CabInfo records
    cabs - ArrayList of RentedTaxi objects
    cabDate - initialized as the last date of the cab
    SERVICE_COST - constant value for the cost of servicing a cab
    cabListPosition - tracks which cab is currently selected in the combo box
    Author:
    Noah Hilliard

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaxiUI(java.util.ArrayList<RentedTaxi> inputCabs, java.util.ArrayList<CabInfo> inputCabList, java.lang.String input, java.lang.String output)
      Constructor accepts a RentedTaxi object and an ArrayList of CabInfo records cabList is initialized for use by the UI and the last date of the first cab is requested through getLastDate as the cabDate
